gold_sent_str: The model entailed four phases : ( 1 ) nonstationary modelling of the margins by the Generalized Additive Models for Location , Scale and Shape ( GAMLSS ) ; ( 2 ) dynamical copula method to describe the nonstationary temporal dependence structure of rainfall observed at adjacent two seasons ; ( 3 ) a dynamic copula - based conditional quantile function to generate simulated series ; ( 4 ) performance assessment of the simulated series by the proposed DCSM model with the preservation of basic statistics of each sequence and simulation accuracy at each data point .
